<denchmark-h:h1>We can probably use FindPythonInterp when we require CMake 3.0.</denchmark-h>
in src/mlpack/bindings/python/CMakeLists.txt is obsolete
allexec2man still contains one linuxism. find .. -executable is gnu find only, the portable idiom would read: find . -perm -u+x

comments.comment: I forgot to say, I'm very happy about 3.0.4. Apart from those very minor thingies, I've got all OpenBSD-specific issues solved, which means that the port has very few patches left by now.

See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/pull/1583>#1583</denchmark-link> for the fixes---thanks again for pointing these out. Always happy to make further changes if more make your life easier.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/pull/1583>#1583</denchmark-link> is merged so I will close this. Thanks again for reporting the issues. :)
